name: Zirkel – Magic of the Rings
description:
Zirkel is an innovative puzzle game about the perfect shape!

The basic mechanics are very easy to learn, but it gets more and more challenging through additional rules like different speeds and directions and varying orbit sizes. 80 different puzzles are waiting for you to solve!

By the way, there are no In App Purchases and no ads in Zirkel – pay once and play it as much as you like without interruption!

So, have fun & all the best,

Marc-André
